capability.name: Custody Administration
capability.definition: A service to provide safe custody services for marketable securities for bank customers
capability.role: Administer the securities scrip (paper and electronic) holdings for a custodial arrangement. This includes administering the physical movements of securities, safe storage, the processing of associated dividends and interest and securities reporting
capability.example: A customer uses the banks custodial services to handle their investment portfolio holdings

key_features.name: Administer securities movements
key_features.description: Enables administer securities movements to support a service to provide safe custody services for marketable securities for bank customers

key_features.name: Arrange safe storage
key_features.description: Enables arrange safe storage to support a service to provide safe custody services for marketable securities for bank customers

key_features.name: Process dividends and interest against securities
key_features.description: Enables process dividends and interest against securities to support a service to provide safe custody services for marketable securities for bank customers

key_features.name: Report on securities holdings
key_features.description: Enables report on securities holdings to support a service to provide safe custody services for marketable securities for bank customers

key_features.name: Determine and apply service fees
key_features.description: Enables determine and apply service fees to support a service to provide safe custody services for marketable securities for bank customers
